src:
Sí hubo intento de golpe de Estado… en 2006: Calderón (Tuit)
04 Nov 2019, 09:43 by Redacción AN / GS



El ex presidente Felipe Calderón tuiteó este lunes que el "intento de golpe de Estado" se dio en 2006, en referencia a las protestas obradoristas por su triunfo electoral, que fue calificado como un "fraude" por AMLO en su momento.
text:
Yes there was an attempted coup ... in 2006: Calderón (Tuit)
04 Nov 2019, 09:43 by AN / GS Writing



Former President Felipe Calderón tweeted on Monday that the "attempted coup d'etat" occurred in 2006, referring to the obradorist protests for his electoral victory, which was described as a "fraud" by AMLO at the time.
